data.eml:eml: A new genus and three new species of Phyllocoptinae (Acari: Eriophyidae) from South China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, De-Wei, Wang, Guo-Quan, Wei, Sui-Gai (2007): A new genus and three new species of Phyllocoptinae (Acari: Eriophyidae) from South China. Zootaxa 1587: 53-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178478
